name: Kirby no Omochabako
overview: Kirby no Omochabako: Hoshi Kuzushi is the one of the Kirby no Omochabako (Kirby's Toy Box) minigames for the Super Famicom's Japan-only Satellaview service. A breakout style game in which the player controls Kirby with Rick-like characters holding the paddle. There are six stages, with King Dedede as the boss of Stage 6.
